verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: complains] [ARG1: pretrial detention is wrong for Manafort] [ARGM-TMP: while he separates thousands of children from their parents and holds them in internment camps because every asylum - seeker who arrives at the border has been ordered into pretrial detention] . ...
